meanings.definition: In a shy or timid manner
meanings.sent1: She spoke bashfully when asked to present in front of the class.
meanings.sent2: He smiled bashfully at the compliment he received.
meanings.sent3: The bashfully blushing student tried to hide behind their book.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden bashfully bloomed under the morning sun.
meanings.sent5: The kitten approached the new toy bashfully, unsure of what to do.

meanings.sent1: The bashfully blushing bride walked down the aisle.
meanings.sent2: He gave a bashfully awkward apology for his mistake.
meanings.sent3: The bashfully giggling child accidentally dropped their ice cream cone.
meanings.sent4: The bashfully blushing sky turned pink as the sun set.
meanings.sent5: Her bashfully hesitant smile charmed everyone at the party.
